txt.en: You accepted a bounty notice asking you to reduce the number of Hakâri in Ghâs Hejai. It can be found to the north of Jadambor.
Inform Zûfan in Jadambor that you have culled the number of cultists
You accepted a bounty notice asking you to reduce the number of Hakâri in Ghâs Hejai. It can be found to the north of Jadambor.

You inform Zûfan about the completed bounty.

'Great work [placeholder]. I know they will return soon enough, but the longer we can keep fighting them back thanks to the likes of adventurers like you, the better.

'Be sure to check the board for more requests, we need all the help we can get down here.'
Inform Zûfan in Jadambor that you have culled the number of cultists.
Informed Zûfan of the completed bounty
Defeat Hakâri to weaken their grasp on the area
A bounty posted by Bôgalekh to go to Ghâs Hejai in the north and reduce the number of Hakâri in the area.
Reach the Hakâri camp to the north of Jadambor

The bounty notice reads:

We can not let the cultists rebuild their strength here in Dil-irmíz.

Any willing adventurers need only to go north to Ghâs Hejai and defeat any you encounter. If you succeed, return to Zûfan here in Jadambor and he will reward you for your efforts.

They can be dangerous. You may want to bring some companions.
